func.title: Find_OnLine

param.name: x1
param.desc: X coordinate of the starting point. Relative to the calling object's center in local calls.

param.name: y1
param.desc: Y coordinate of the starting point. Relative to the calling object's center in local calls.

param.name: x2
param.desc: X coordinate of the end point. Relative to the calling object's center in local calls.

param.name: y2
param.desc: Y coordinate of the end point. Relative to the calling object's center in local calls.

func.desc: Search criterion: finds all objects which overlap a line going from one point to the other.
func.remark: This is equivalent to checking Find_AtPoint for each point on the line.
For additional information on the use of this function see FindObjects.

example.code: for(var obj in FindObjects( Find_OnLine(0,0, LandscapeWidth()-GetX(),0), Find_OCF(OCF_Alive) )) obj->Kill();
example.text: Railgun: Kills everything that's on the same height right of the executing object.
